ygData.subject: Flicker
ygData.msgSnippet: Flicker continued looking at the monitor.  He wished the Maximals would clear out so he could talk to Megatron, but then a nearby device started beeping

Flicker continued looking at the monitor.  He wished the Maximals 
would clear out so he could talk to Megatron, but then a nearby 
device started beeping haywire and he picked it up.

Flicker:  Huh....is this thing busted that would mean there's a 
m......(looses his breath) OH MATRIX!  IT'S HER!

He runs to a stasis pod and takes a firefly Beast Mode.  Then he 
opens the door and activates a fairly weak energy shield and sets off 
towards the Rouges base.
